title: Inspires connection
details: Coding is better with friends. You'd be hard pressed to find a better cheerleader, encourager, and kind communicator than me. I thrive when on teams where everyone checks in with each other and shares time and knowledge.
quote: Linda is the kind of teammate everyone wishes for: steady, always there to lend a hand, and constantly pushing herself beyond her limits.

caseStudy.title: Boosting team morale and velocity
caseStudy.result: saved 16 hours of testing time catching and fixing a bug day of release. built components used across 3 applications.
